summary: This document is a forwarded email chain from August 10, 2019, expressing urgent concern about a potential leak of information from a hospital regarding Jeffrey Epstein's death. It requests that the information be passed to the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) and the FBI.

persons.name: Ewald
persons.context: The subject of the potential hospital information leak; the name appears to be a typographical error for 'Epstein' based on the context of the email subject.

events.title: Urgent request about hospital leak
events.description: An email is sent expressing urgent concern about a potential leak of information from a hospital regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein (referred to as 'Ewald').

keyFacts: The document is a forwarded email dated August 10, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
It raises an urgent concern about a potential information leak from a hospital regarding Epstein's death.
The email explicitly requests the information be given to the OIG and FBI, indicating official investigative interest.
The name 'Ewald' appears to be a typographical error for 'Epstein' in the initial part of the text.
